sentences.sContent: You have to become awfully large to be unaffordable -- there's lots of cash, lots of capital out there for acquisitions.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have to become awfully large to be unaffordable -- there's lots of cash, lots of capital out there for acquisitions.
sentences.sCn: 制药业者坐拥很多现金,进行收购的资本雄厚,你必须变成让人买不起的超大公司.

sentences.sContent: ...think of joy as an unaffordable luxury in a nation where there is awful poverty...
